title: Microsoft India | L60
content:

How does this offer look?

title: MathWorks | Engineer in EDG | Oncampus | Dec2024 | Fresher Full time Offer
content:

title: WeWork | SDE 2 | Bangalore
content:
Education: B Tech in Information Technology
Years of Experience: 2.5 FTE + 6 M internship
Prior Experience: Product based startup in Bangalore
Date of the Offer: 17th Dec, 2024
Company: WeWork
Title/Level: SDE 2
Location: Bangalore
Salary: 2200000 (fixed) 
Relocation: NA
Signing Bonus: 100000
Stock bonus:NA
Bonus: Performance-based bonus (20 - 35 % per year)
Other Benifits: 89600
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + JB): ~ 2829600 
Other details: Tried negotiation, but HR mentioned that this is the max they can offer.

Have another offer around 10% lower then this, but with remote location and better company. Probably will prefer that one over this.
